title.narrative: Rehabilitation support services in earthquake effected districts in Nepal

description.narrative: Dolakha is a district in Janakpur zone
Nuwakot is a district in Bagmati zone
Rasuwa is a district in Sagarmatha zone
Sindhupalchowk is a Nepali district in Bagmati

sector.narrative: facilitation of training to health and rehabilitation professionals at the national level and in14 districts most affected by earthquake

description.narrative: Total funds committed to the activities under this project to be disbursed by the funder upon completion of agreed deliverables
